Options.Controls.Heading: Controls
Options.MenuKey.Label: Menu Key
Options.MenuKey.Tooltip: Key or button to show the trash menu for viewing, toggling or removing trash items
Options.ModifierKey.Label: Modifier Key
Options.ModifierKey.Tooltip: Key or button to hold while trashing an item to designate that item as trash
Options.Gameplay.Heading: Gameplay
Options.SuppressPickupNotifications.Tool: Don't show the normal HUD notifications when a trash item is picked up.
Options.TrashNotifications.Label: Show trash notifications
Options.TrashNotifications.Tooltip: Show HUD notifications whenever items are automatically trashed. Best used with '{{suppressPickupOption}}' turned on.
Options.MinEmptySlots.Label: Maintain empty slots
Options.MinEmptySlots.Tooltip: If enabled (> 0), items will only be trashed if the number of empty slots in your inventory is already below, or about to go below this number.
Options.RecoveryTime.Label: Recovery Window
Options.RecoveryTime.Tooltip: Maximum amount of time that an item is available for recovery after it is trashed (0 = no recovery allowed).
RecoveryMenu.Title: Recently-trashed items
TrashMenu.Title: Trash Settings for {{locationName}}
TrashMenu.EmptyText: Trash list is empty for this location. To designate an item as trash, use the inventory menu to drop an item in the trash while holding the {{modifierKeyName}} ({{modifierKey}}).
